title: Monday Post Show (8-2-21)
itunes:title: Monday Post Show (8-2-21)
description:
We give a few TV show recommendations on White Lotus (HBO Max) and Sweet Tooth (Netflix). Bobby talks about why he would survive in an apocalypse. Eddie talks about his family vacation to Disney and not being able to have time with his wife. He said he enjoyed Disney but it was more for his kids. Amy also shares stories from her vacation on getting her cat. The only problem is her dog and cat are having trouble getting along right now. Lunchbox talks about going to Vegas without his kids. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
